info.title: Denner Mobile Web Service
info.description: RESTful API for the Denner Mobile App

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all stores (Filialen).

parameters.name: f.open
parameters.description: Filter by opening, e.g. "f.open=__in_now,20:00" will return all stores which are open right now or today at 8:00 pm.

parameters.name: f.services
parameters.description: Filter by services, e.g. "f.services=__in_d4d34d84-b32b-46fb-b45f-2bde4b72be81" will return all stores which have at least one of the given services.

parameters.name: f.channel
parameters.description: Filter by channels, e.g. "f.channel=__in_18549f95-6471-4e21-968f-8a0bf2e0f79b" will return all stores which have one of the given channels.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=name__desc" will sort by name (Z to A)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of the store filters.
Use this operation to get a list of all featured articles.

availability_limitations.region: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich
availability_limitations.store: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich

wine.character: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.

get.summary: List the online filters of a given type
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online filters (Angebotsfilter; e.g. "Aktionen aktuelle Woche" or "Aktionen der Folgewoche").

parameters.name: f.types
parameters.description: Type of online filters to list (supported are "promotion" and "wine"), e.g. "f.types=__in_promotion" will return all online filters which should be shown in the promotional area of the App (red color).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=name__desc" will sort by name (Z to A)

get.summary: List the online publications appearing in given online filter
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all publications (and the contained articles) for a specific online filter (e.g. "Wochenaktionen" and "Wochenend-Knaller", which are both appearing within "Aktionen aktuelle Woche").

parameters.name: f.online_group
parameters.description: Filter by online groups, e.g. "f.online_groups=__in_58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8" will return all online publications which have at least one of the given online groups.

parameters.name: filter_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online filter

availability_limitations.region: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich
availability_limitations.store: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich

wine.character: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.

get.summary: List the online groups appearing in given online filter
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online groups (Internet-Sortimente) for a specific online filter.

parameters.name: filter_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online filter

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all banners.

banners.title: 20% auf alle Lindt-Artikel*
banners.html:
Freitag, 27. und Samstag, 28. November 2015
20% auf alle Lindt-Artikel* auch auf bestehende Aktionspreise!
*nicht mit anderen Gutscheinen und Bons kumulierbar. Solange Vorrat.

Cooling.description: Cooling type (0 = no cooling, 1 = refrigerated, 2 = frozen)

text.description: Validity text as displayed to users (localized)

Validity.description: Generic validity based on dates (from/to) and a corresponding text

short_text.description: Validity text (short version) as displayed to users (localized)

long_text.description: Validity text (long version) as displayed to users (localized)

ArticleValidity.description: Article validity based on dates (from/to) and corresponding texts (short and long version)

property.description: Name of the property to filter against

title.description: Public title as displayed to users (localized)

credit_card.description: Credit card can be used for payments?

weekly_opening_days.description: Weekly opening days, exact opening plan for the week. Items are sorted for correct display.

reason.description: Reason for the special opening as displayed to users (localized)

closed.description: Is the store closed on this day?

statements.description: Statements for the current day. Items are sorted for correct display.

text_override.description: Closure text, instead of open form/to (localized)

change_info.description: Tooltip info, the reason for the change (localized)

text.description: Article content as displayed to users (localized, e.g. "75 cl")
Article base content as displayed to users (localized, e.g. "10 cl")

stars.description: Stars, rounded to the correct deciaml value

value.description: Navision stock count, might be negative

message.description: Stock information as displayed to users (localized)

type.description: Mime type for the output image

url.description: Image URL which can be used, for example, in an 'img' tag

title.description: Public title as displayed to users (localized)

description.description: Public description as displayed to users (localized)

price_info.description: Price information as displayed to users (localized, e.g. "Konkurrenzvergleich")

unit_price_info.description: Unit price information as displayed to users (localized, e.g. "Einzelflasche: 9.90 statt 11.40")

panel.description: Panel text as displayed to users (localized) DEPRECATED: substituted by "stopper", will be removed in v2

promoted.description: Is it a promoted article (should be displayed with full information)?

compared.description: Is the article's price compared to an offer from an other company?

title.description: Public title as displayed to users (localized)
Public title as displayed to users (localized)
Public title as displayed to users (localized)

closable.description: Can the user close the banner?

position.description: Where the banner is shown in the UI

title.description: Title as shown to the user (localized)

html.description: Text as shown to the user (localized)

total_stores.description: The number of items on all pages

property.description: Name of the property to filter against

title.description: Public title of the option as displayed to users (localized)

region.description: Region availability as displayed to users (localized)

store.description: Store availability as displayed to users (localized)

OnlinePublicationArticle_availability_li.description: Texts for information about limited availability

PageSizeParam.name: page_size
PageSizeParam.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

SortParam.name: sort
SortParam.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=name__desc" will sort by name (Z to A)

OnlineFilterIdPathParam.name: filter_id
OnlineFilterIdPathParam.description: The unique identifier of an online filter

ArticleIdPathParam.name: article_id
ArticleIdPathParam.description: The unique identifier of an article
